did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: This additional Warren Chappell material consists of twelve illustrated note cards and place name cards, 1980-1983, and undated, by Chappell addressed to Junius and Charlotte Fishburne.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Warren Chappell Collection, 1980-1983, Accession #10204-am, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These items were given to the Library by Mrs. Junius R. Fishburne, Charlottesville, Virginia, on April 16, 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This additional Warren Chappell material consists of twelve illustrated note cards and place name cards, 1980-1983, and undated, by Chappell addressed to Junius and Charlotte Fishburne. These include illustrations on original greeting cards expressing various sentiments such as thank you, get well wishes, welcome home to Virginia, and place name cards: "The Cavalier Experience," "It's Spring," "Fishburne at the bar! Spirit & Law" "Fortitude in Fire Fishburn" and "Greenwich Mean Time," and "Fruity Cake" and "Egg Noggin."
